text: phwk khea di yudthux brrda phracea nxkcak phraxngkh kranan hrux? Cng klaw theid muhammad “khx hı phwk than na hlakthan khxng phwk than ma ni khux khamphir thi xyu kab chan (xalkurxan) læa khamphir thi mi xyu kxn hna chan (tea rxt læa xin yil)” tæwa swn hıy khxng phwk khea miru khwam cring phwk khea cung phin hlang mein hang
